TopicTitle: [Tutorial] survive a long fall in an EVA suit (0.17)

Articles.Content:
This is technically a bug, but if you hate cheating and ending the mission before an imminent crash, try this cheat/trick:

1. Press R and activate the EVA suit's RCS thrusters. It does not matter how much fuel is in them

2. (this is hard to do) RIGHT before hitting the ground press R and deactivate the suit so that the animation is still playing as he/she hits the ground. They may fly upwards again. repeat as necessary until they are safe.

3. Congratulations! You just exploited a bug (AKA Glitch in the Matrix) in ver. 0.1.7! Keep using it to keep your kerbans safe from what is otherwise an imminent death!

Challenge: try this on the Sun (I am horrible at orbital maneuvers and am stuck in a permanent 15 million K orbit around it.
